exam.question: They are ______ investors who always make thorough investigations both on local and international markets before making an investment.

answer.explain: cautious： 谨慎。句意： 他们是谨慎的投资者， 在做一项投资之前， 他们总会彻底地调查国内和国际市场。conscious： 有意识的； indecisive： 非决定性的。

sentences.sContent: ...an implicit warning to the Moroccans not to continue or repeat the military actions they began a week ago.
sentences.sCn: …叫摩洛哥人不要继续或重复一周前开始的军事行动的含蓄警告。

sentences.sContent: ...They found that implicit bias has fallen by as much as 90% compared with the level found in a similar study in 2006...
...who runs a website that measures implicit bias using similar test...

remMethod.val: im(进入) ＋ plic(重叠) ＋ it(意义) → 意义叠在里面 → 含蓄的

words.tran: 暗示；使牵连其中；含有…的意思

trans.tranCn: 不言明的， 含蓄的； 内含的， 固有的； 无疑问的
trans.tranOther: suggested or understood without being stated directly
